channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Mangolds - Branding & Corporate Identity
item.description: The new Corporate Identity of Mangolds a well-known vegetarian restaurant in Graz/Austria shows perfectly its colorful wide offering. No eco-hippie and boring tofu! Cool atmosphere, wide selection, freshness, quality, good mood. CREDITS Client: Mangolds das Frische Restaurant, MMag. Julia Pengg Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction and graphic design:Wolfgang Niederl Project management: Johanna Tauschmann Product photography: Marion Luttenberger
item.content:encoded: The new Corporate Identity of Mangolds a well-known vegetarian restaurant in Graz/Austria shows perfectly its colorful wide offering. No eco-hippie and boring tofu! Cool atmosphere, wide selection, freshness, quality, good mood. CREDITS Client: Mangolds das Frische Restaurant, MMag. Julia Pengg Creative direction: Mike Fuisz Art direction and graphic design:Wolfgang Niederl Project management: Johanna Tauschmann Product photography: Marion Luttenberger

item.title: Poly free web font
item.description: The initial design plan aimed to define an alternative system of diacritical marks to be used in parallel with standard punctuation marks. The glyphs were drawn with a nearly vertical stress and with ink traps in all of the stroke junctions in order to tolerate cramped tracking and paper porosity, respectively. These two issues (cramped tracking and porosity) are both typical of small print runs of low-cost editions.
item.content:encoded: The initial design plan aimed to define an alternative system of diacritical marks to be used in parallel with standard punctuation marks. The glyphs were drawn with a nearly vertical stress and with ink traps in all of the stroke junctions in order to tolerate cramped tracking and paper porosity, respectively. These two issues (cramped tracking and porosity) are both typical of small print runs of low-cost editions.

item.title: Neo Pop Surrealism
item.description: I am continuing my explorations of diverse cultures both in place and time while being more aware of certain popular cultural references whether in silhouette or as object.

item.title: adidas Consortium Rod Laver
item.description: Designed for adidas Consortium, in collaboration with Limited Edt. Vault, a sneaker boutique. A classic Rod Laver, 500 pairs worldwide. This collab is for FW10 collection, which coincides with the global release of the movie, TRON:Legacy (scheduled Dec 2010). Hence, I seek my design inspirations from the classic TRON movie back in the 80s. Midnight blue full grain upper with glow in the dark grid patterns, keeping it simple yet a subtle pop at the same time. I designed a limited run of tees to go with this release as well.
item.content:encoded: Designed for adidas Consortium, in collaboration with Limited Edt. Vault, a sneaker boutique. A classic Rod Laver, 500 pairs worldwide. This collab is for FW10 collection, which coincides with the global release of the movie, TRON:Legacy (scheduled Dec 2010). Hence, I seek my design inspirations from the classic TRON movie back in the 80s. Midnight blue full grain upper with glow in the dark grid patterns, keeping it simple yet a subtle pop at the same time. I designed a limited run of tees to go with this release as well.

item.title: Scarygirl
item.description: Art Director Brought onboard specifically for the Art/Creative Direction of Scarygirl. Working collaboratively with lead artists, designers, developers and producers to drive and support the artistic vision through all stages of production. Working closely with external developers, from pre-production to final game. Execute on the vision and direct the team. Day to day communication through emails, video kinect, skype and conference calls. Periodic travel spending a week each time with the teams and maintaining the creative direction.
item.content:encoded: Art Director Brought onboard specifically for the Art/Creative Direction of Scarygirl. Working collaboratively with lead artists, designers, developers and producers to drive and support the artistic vision through all stages of production. Working closely with external developers, from pre-production to final game. Execute on the vision and direct the team. Day to day communication through emails, video kinect, skype and conference calls. Periodic travel spending a week each time with the teams and maintaining the creative direction.

item.title: Premios Nacionales de Diseño 1987-2006
item.description: Catalogue for an exhibition marking the 25th anniversary of the National Design Prizes (PND). The exhibition was intended to showcase the culture of design and contrast it with the design culture propagated by the media, a theme reflected in the publications tabloid-style format. The exhibition was organised in three sections designers, users and companies and in the catalogue these are linked to three colours: red, blue and green. Because the catalogue was so large, a folder needed to be designed to make it easier to carry. To store the publication on a bookshelf, the handles are simply separated along the die-cut line, and the folder becomes a protective cover.
item.content:encoded: Catalogue for an exhibition marking the 25th anniversary of the National Design Prizes (PND). The exhibition was intended to showcase the culture of design and contrast it with the design culture propagated by the media, a theme reflected in the publications tabloid-style format. The exhibition was organised in three sections designers, users and companies and in the catalogue these are linked to three colours: red, blue and green. Because the catalogue was so large, a folder needed to be designed to make it easier to carry. To store the publication on a bookshelf, the handles are simply separated along the die-cut line, and the folder becomes a protective cover.

item.title: Toerisme Vlaanderen: Stop Motion
item.description: When "Toerisme Vlaanderen" asked us to make a short animation we where excited and we had the wildest idea's. However our happiness was short when they said we only had one week to get the job done... The result you can see here.
item.content:encoded: When "Toerisme Vlaanderen" asked us to make a short animation we where excited and we had the wildest idea's. However our happiness was short when they said we only had one week to get the job done... The result you can see here.

item.title: Concrete Misplot Houses
item.description: Featured in swiss architectural magazine Hochparterres Raumtraum section, these visualizations of future architectures search for the accidental in computer driven manufacturing processes. Based on iconic housing shapes, these buildings were intended as prototypes for mass-customization. Yet, as things go with computerized manufacturing, there have been misplots. The cartridge was not loaded properly. The concrete was set to the wrong parameters or scale. The printer module falsely translated a data set These misprints are the rejects of this early process, and they are now being used as shared homes by elderly people from the former squatter scene.
item.content:encoded: Featured in swiss architectural magazine Hochparterres Raumtraum section, these visualizations of future architectures search for the accidental in computer driven manufacturing processes. Based on iconic housing shapes, these buildings were intended as prototypes for mass-customization. Yet, as things go with computerized manufacturing, there have been misplots. The cartridge was not loaded properly. The concrete was set to the wrong parameters or scale. The printer module falsely translated a data set These misprints are the rejects of this early process, and they are now being used as shared homes by elderly people from the former squatter scene.

item.title: Typographic Revolt - HypeForType Typefaces
item.description: Greetings, Comrades. Good design and proper use of Type are under attack. In this Direct Mailer for Type foundry HypeForType.com, we instigated a typographic revolt, a rallying cry to all Type and their users to take up arms against the tyranny of mediocrity that assails our eyeballs and spits in the faces of good designers all over the world. Rise, sons of Gutenburg! Our day of reckoning is at hand!
item.content:encoded: Greetings, Comrades. Good design and proper use of Type are under attack. In this Direct Mailer for Type foundry HypeForType.com, we instigated a typographic revolt, a rallying cry to all Type and their users to take up arms against the tyranny of mediocrity that assails our eyeballs and spits in the faces of good designers all over the world. Rise, sons of Gutenburg! Our day of reckoning is at hand!
